snippet.name: try catch error path
snippet.starttext: <cftry> <!--- do something here to cause an error --->
snippet.endtext: <cfset fail("Error path test... should not have gotten here")> <cfcatch type="mxunit.exception.AssertionFailedError"> <cfrethrow> </cfcatch> <cfcatch type="any"></cfcatch> </cftry>
